# Iminicus Crystal, Greater
## Overview
**Aura** faint conjuration and transmutation; **CL** 7th

**Slot** — (weapon crystal)

**Price** 24,000 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This dark red weapon augment crystal pulses slowly with a dark inner light and adds the *[[Truebane (MagWpnSpcAb)|truebane]]* weapon ability to any weapon it is attached to and also ignores 5 points of damage resistance which the creature struck by this weapon might have.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], [[Penetrating Strike (Feat)|Penetrating Strike]], *[[Summon Monster III (Spell)|summon monster III]]*

**Cost** 12,000 gp

**Source:** The Mage's Tower
